googlelogin:
{{doc-special|GoogleLogin}}
Also used as label for the button shown in [[Special:Login]].
googlelogin-auth-service-name: The name of the service used to authenticate an user.
googlelogin-managelegend: Text used in legend on Special:ManageGoogleLogin.
googlelogin-manage-usersubmit: Submit text for find user form on Special:ManageGoogleLogin.
googlelogin-manage-user:
Used on Special:ManageGoogleLogin to show, which user is managed.
* $1 - The name of the managed user, used for GENDER
googlelogin-manage-linked:
Message, that indicates, that the Wiki user is linked with one or more Google account(s).
* $1 - Number of Google accounts (used for PLURAL support only)
googlelogin-manage-notlinked: Message that indicates, that the Wiki user isn't linked with a Google account.
googlelogin-manage-changelegend: Legendmessage for the "Change Google ID" form on Special:ManageGoogleLogin.
googlelogin-manage-noplus: Notice message, that the passed Google ID doesn't have a Plus profile, including a hint to check a typing error.
googlelogin-manage-changedsuccess: Indicates, that the manages user is linked with the Google account now.
googlelogin-manage-terminatesuccess: Successmessage when the connection between the User and Google account was removed.
googlelogin-manage-changederror: Indicates an error while trying to link the Wiki user and Google account.
googlelogin-manage-terminatebutton: Buttonlabel to terminate the connection between Google account and Wiki user.
googlelogin-manage-invalidid: Notice, that the given Google ID is invalid and needs to be numeric.
googlelogin-manage-isplusser: Label for a field that indicates, if the User is registered in Google Plus.
googlelogin-manage-givenid: Notice, that the given Google ID is already connected with another user.
googlelogin-manage-orgname: Label for field that shows the actual organization the User works in.
googlelogin-manage-orgtitle: Name of the job position of the User.
googlelogin-manage-yes:
Used to indicate if a user is registered on Google Plus.
{{Identical|Yes}}
googlelogin-manage-no:
Used to indicate if a user isn't registered on Google Plus.
{{Identical|No}}
googlelogin-manage-openpluslink: Label for link to open the Google Plus profile of the user.
googlelogin-manage-unknownerror: Error message, when the Google Plus profile data could not be loaded.
googlelogin-manage-plusinfo-title: Title of the information dialog on [[Special:ManageGoogleLogin]].
googlelogin-manage-errorloading: Title of an error dialog with a generic "There was an error" message.
googlelogin-manage-addlabel: Label of an input box on [[Special:ManageGoogleLogin]] to add a Google ID to a wiki account.
googlelogin-username:
Used to indicate a username input field.
{{Identical|Username}}
googlelogin-create: Used as label for the button shown in [[Special:CreateAccount]].
googlelogin-generic-error:
Generic error message for errors with no specific error message.

Parameters:
* $1 - a short description of the error (e.g. Database error)
googlelogin-unallowed-domain: The domain of the user isn't allowed to use with Google Login, show this as an error message. $1 is the E-Maildomain used.
googlelogin-form-merge: Title of button to merge the wikiaccount and Google account, if the user is logged into a wikiaccount (and not connected to a Google account) and navigates to Special:GoogleLogin.
googlelogin-form-unlink: Title of button to unlink the connection between the wiki user account and Google account.
googlelogin-email:
Title of value email address in account information table on [[Special:GoogleLogin]].
{{Identical|E-mail address}}
googlelogin-googleuser: Title of value Google-Account (Google username) in account information table on Special:GoogleLogin.
googlelogin-information-title:
Title of fieldset containing the table with account information.
{{Identical|Account information}}
googlelogin-information-body: Information text above account information table, that the following table contains information about the Google and wiki account and the link status (linked, not linked).
googlelogin-linkstatus: Title of value Link status in account information table on Special:GoogleLogin (is wiki account linked to Google account?).
googlelogin-linked: Google and wiki account are linked. (Used in account information table)
googlelogin-unlinked: Google and wiki account aren't linked. (Used in account information table)
googlelogin-link-other: The Google account is already linked to a wiki user, but not to the actual logged in wiki user. To link the Google account with the actual wiki account, the user must unlink the connection wit the other wiki account, only one connection per Google account is allowed.
googlelogin-link-same: The Google account is already linked to the currently logged in wiki user.
googlelogin-prefs-status: Name of the Line in Special:Preferences identifying GoogleLoign status (linked or not linked).
googlelogin-error-no-authentication-work: Error message that gives the user the information, that there's no active authentication workflow and that the workflow can therefore not be continued.
googlelogin-loginbutton-help: Help message used for the Login with Google button on [[Special:UserLogin]].
googlelogin-link-help: Help message used for the Link with Google button on [[Special:LinkAccounts]].
googlelogin-param-error-label: Label for the input field for an error code returned by Google in case of an authentication failure.
googlelogin-param-error-help: Help message for the input field, which is described in {{msg-mw|googlelogin-param-error-label}}.
googlelogin-param-code-label: Label for the input field for an access token returned by Google when the user was authenticated successfully.
googlelogin-param-code-help: Help message for the input field, which is described in {{msg-mw|googlelogin-param-code-label}}.
googlelogin-change-account-not-linked: Error message when an user tries to remove a Google account connection, but the wiki account has no connected Google accounts.
googlelogin-auth-service-unknown-account: Used in the very rare case, that the Google ID connected with the MediaWiki User isn't known anymore.
googlelogin-access-denied: Message returned to the user, when the access to the Google account information was rejected.
googlelogin-alloweddomains-notmanageable: A message that informs the user, that the list of allowed domains, which can be used to login with GoogleLogin, can not be changed/managed using the user interface, e.g. because it is managed using an array in the LocalSettings.php.
googlelogin-alloweddomain-terminatebutto:
Label of a column with checkboxes to remove, when selected, a specific allowed domain from the list of allowed domains.
{{Identical|Remove}}
googlelogin-alloweddomain-addlabel: Label of a text field, which can be used to add a domain to the list of allowed domains.
googlelogin-alloweddomain-added-success:
Message, which is printed when a domain was successfully added to the list of allowed domains.

Parameters:
* $1 - The domain, which was added
googlelogin-alloweddomain-removed-succes:
Message, which is printed when a domain was successfully removed from the list of allowed domains.

Parameters:
* $1 - The domain, which was removed
googlelogin-alloweddomain-change-error: Error message, which is printed when a domain could not be added or removed for an unknown reason.
tag-googlelogin-description: Short description, that account creations with this tag are made with GoogleLogin.
right-managegooglelogin:
Description of user right to view, edit and remove Google Login connections.

{{Doc-right|managegooglelogin}}
echo-category-title-change-googlelogin: Message in {{Special:Preferences}} for if the user wants to get notified with an Echo alert, if the connected Google accounts are changed by a GoogleLogin administrator.
notification-header-change-googlelogin: Title of the GoogleLogin changed Echo alert.
notification-change-googlelogin:
Generic message of the GoogleLogin changed Echo alert.

Parameters:
* $1 - Username of the agent in wikitext
* $2 - Username of the agent in plain text (for GENDER support)
notification-add-googlelogin:
Echo alert message when a new connection with one or more Google account(s) was created.

Parameters:
* $1 - A comma seperated list of added Google account IDs
* $2 - The amount of Google IDs added (for {{PLURAL}} support)
notification-remove-googlelogin:
Echo alert message when the connection to one or more Google account(s) was removed.

Parameters:
* $1 - A comma seperated list of removed Google account IDs
* $2 - The amount of Google IDs added (for <nowiki>{{PLURAL}}</nowiki> support).
echo-pref-tooltip-change-googlelogin:
This is a short description of the change-googlelogin notification category.
{{Related|Echo-pref-tooltip}}
